quote: I was the first one in the gym, and the last one to leave.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: The Public Is Merely A Multiplied "Me."
author: Mark Twain

quote: The greatest truth is honesty, and the greatest falsehood is dishonesty.
author: Abu Bakr (R.A)

quote: Forget safety. Live where you fear to live. Destroy your reputation. Be notorious.
author: Rumi

quote: Do The Right Thing. It Will Gratify Some People And Astonish The Rest.
author: Mark Twain
